languages.text: "Раз все они связаны единой волей, мы могли бы начать с удара по ней. Если астропатический хор сможет заглушить голос выводка, мы сможем атаковать внезапно и действовать достаточно эффективно прежде, чем враги смогут восстановить единство и обменяться информацией".

"Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy could restore cohesion and alert their forces to the assault."
languages.original_text: "Раз все они связаны единой волей, мы могли бы начать с удара по ней. Если астропатический хор сможет заглушить голос выводка, мы сможем атаковать внезапно и действовать достаточно эффективно прежде, чем враги смогут восстановить единство и обменяться информацией".

traits.locale_text: "Since all of them are linked by the common will, we could start by launching an attack on it. If the astropathic choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden attack and act efficiently enough before the enemy would be able restore their unity and exchange information."

"Since all of them are linked by the common will, we could start by launching an attack on it. If the astropathic choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden attack and act efficiently enough before the enemy would be able restore their unity and exchange information."

"Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy would be able restore cohesion and inform each other of the assault."

"Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy would be able restore cohesion and inform each other of the assault."

"Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy could restore cohesion and alert their forces to the assault."

"Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy could restore cohesion and alert their forces to the assault."

languages.text: “考虑到这些生物由某种共同意志联结在一起，我们可以从这个方向考虑，发动攻击。如果星语唱诗班的声音能盖过虫群的声音，扰乱敌人的同感，那我们就能赶在它们恢复通讯，发出警告之前进行突然袭击，以迅雷不及掩耳之势将其一网打尽。”
languages.original_text: "Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy could restore cohesion and alert their forces to the assault."

traits.locale_text: “考虑到这些生物由某种共同意志联结在一起，我们可以从这个方向考虑，发动攻击。如果星语唱诗班的声音能盖过虫群的声音，扰乱敌人的同感，那我们就能赶在它们恢复通讯，发出警告之前进行突然袭击，以迅雷不及掩耳之势将其一网打尽。”

languages.text: «Dado que todos ellos están unidos por una voluntad común, podríamos empezar lanzando nuestro ataque allí. Si el Coro de Astrópatas pudiera ahogar la voz de la prole, podríamos lanzar un ataque repentino y actuar con la suficiente rapidez antes de que el enemigo pudiera restablecer la unión e informarse entre ellos del asalto».
languages.original_text: "Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy would be able restore cohesion and inform each other of the assault."

traits.locale_text: «Dado que todos ellos están unidos por una voluntad común, podríamos empezar lanzando nuestro ataque allí. Si el Coro de Astrópatas pudiera ahogar la voz de la prole, podríamos lanzar un ataque repentino y actuar con la suficiente rapidez antes de que el enemigo pudiera restablecer la unión e informarse entre ellos del asalto».

languages.text: 「奴らのすべてが共通の意志で結ばれているのだから、まずはそこから攻撃を開始すればいい。感応通信聖歌隊が個体群の声をかき消すことができれば、敵が結束を取り戻し、互いに襲撃について情報を共有する前に、奇襲攻撃を仕掛け、余裕をもって迅速に行動することができるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy would be able restore cohesion and inform each other of the assault."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らのすべてが共通の意志で結ばれているのだから、まずはそこから攻撃を開始すればいい。感応通信聖歌隊が個体群の声をかき消すことができれば、敵が結束を取り戻し、互いに襲撃について情報を共有する前に、奇襲攻撃を仕掛け、余裕をもって迅速に行動することができるだろう」

languages.text: « Puisque tous sont liés par une volonté commune, nous pourrions commencer par lancer une attaque là-bas. Si le chœur astropathique pouvait faire taire les voix du couvain, nous pourrions lancer une frappe éclair suffisamment rapide pour que nos ennemis n'aient pas le temps de réagir et de s'informer les uns les autres de l'attaque. »
languages.original_text: "Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy would be able restore cohesion and inform each other of the assault."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque tous sont liés par une volonté commune, nous pourrions commencer par lancer une attaque là-bas. Si le chœur astropathique pouvait faire taire les voix du couvain, nous pourrions lancer une frappe éclair suffisamment rapide pour que nos ennemis n'aient pas le temps de réagir et de s'informer les uns les autres de l'attaque. »

languages.text: "Da sie alle durch einen gemeinsamen Willen verbunden sind, könnten wir mit unserem Angriff dort ansetzen. Wenn der astropathische Chor die Stimmen der Rotte übertönen könnte, können wir einen plötzlichen Angriff unternehmen und schnell genug handeln, ehe der Feind sich organisieren kann."
languages.original_text: "Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy would be able restore cohesion and inform each other of the assault."

traits.locale_text: "Da sie alle durch einen gemeinsamen Willen verbunden sind, könnten wir mit unserem Angriff dort ansetzen. Wenn der astropathische Chor die Stimmen der Rotte übertönen könnte, können wir einen plötzlichen Angriff unternehmen und schnell genug handeln, ehe der Feind sich organisieren kann."

languages.text: "Her biri ortak bir iradeyle bağlı olduğuna göre saldırımıza oradan başlayabiliriz. Eğer ki Astropatik Koro, sürünün sesini ortaya çıkarabilirse ani bir saldırı başlatarak düşmanın bağlantıyı onarıp kuvvetlerini taarruza dair uyarmasından önce hızlıca harekete geçebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Since all of them are linked by a common will, we could start by launching our attack there. If the Astropathic Choir could drown out the voice of the brood, we would be able to launch a sudden strike and act quickly enough before the enemy could restore cohesion and alert their forces to the assault."
